mapper.select: SELECT P.PROFESSOR_NAME FROM COURSE C JOIN PROFESSOR P ON C.PROFESSOR_ID = P.PROFESSOR_ID WHERE COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_notice (COURSE_NOTICE_NO, COURSE_CODE, COURSE_NOTICE_TITLE, COURSE_NOTICE_CONTENT, COURSE_NOTICE_REG_DATE, COURSE_NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE, COURSE_NOTICE_ATTACHED_FILENAME, COURSE_NOTICE_HIT) VALUES ( COURSE_NOTICE_SEQ.nextval, #{courseCode}, #{courseNoticeTitle}, #{courseNoticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{courseNoticeUpdateDate}, #{courseNoticeAttachedFile}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE COURSE_NOTICE SET COURSE_NOTICE_TITLE = #{courseNoticeTitle}, COURSE_NOTICE_CONTENT = #{courseNoticeContent}, COURSE_NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode} AND COURSE_NOTICE_NO = #{courseNoticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_NOTICE_FILE (FNO, FILENAME, FILEORINAME, GROUPNO, FILEURL) VALUES (course_notice_file_seq.nextval, #{fileName}, #{fileOriName}, #{groupNo}, #{fileUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT F.FILEORINAME ,F.FILENAME,F.GROUPNO FROM COURSE_NOTICE N JOIN COURSE_NOTICE_FILE F ON N.COURSE_NOTICE_ATTACHED_FILENAME = F.GROUPNO WHERE COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode} AND COURSE_NOTICE_NO = #{courseNoticeNo}
